messages.content: I am sorry you are sad.  What is upsetting you?
I just feel sad.  Help me please.

Is it because your favorite animal is dying?  If so, you can help save the elephant by donating to Save the Elephant Foundation.  They are working to protect elephants in Africa.  Other than that, I am not sure what is upsetting you.  If you want to talk about it, you can talk to a therapist or friend.
